2. HOMO (Hole Mobility)
3. LUMO (Luminescence)

These are the properties of the material PSFDTBT that are being described in the paragraph.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to material properties in the paragraph:

2. HOMO
3. LUMO

These three entities describe the material properties of PSFDTBT, specifically its ability to absorb light, its HOMO (hole mobility) and LUMO (luminescence) positions.
